con:part.con:content: <definitions name="PlayerService" targetNamespace="http://nzlotteries.co.nz/service/v1" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://nzlotteries.co.nz/service/v1" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:e="http://nzlotteries.co.nz/exception/v1" xmlns:v="http://nzlotteries.co.nz/value/v1"> <types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://nzlotteries.co.nz/value/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xsd:complexType name="VoidOutput"/> <xsd:element name="validationInquiryInstantInput" type="v:ValidationInquiryInstantInput"/> <xsd:element name="validationInquiryInstantOutput" type="v:ValidationInquiryInstantOutput"/> <xsd:complexType name="ValidationInquiryInstantInput"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ticketSerialNumber" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="checkDigits" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="channelId" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ValidationInquiryInstantOutput"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="amount" type="xsd:double" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="resultText" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="freeTicketsNumber" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="prizeLevel" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="validationInquiryOnlineInput" type="v:ValidationInquiryOnlineInput"/> <xsd:element name="validationInquiryOnlineOutput" type="v:ValidationInquiryOnlineOutput"/> <xsd:complexType name="ValidationInquiryOnlineInput"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ticketSerialNumber" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="channelId" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="ValidationInquiryOnlineOutput"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="cashAmount" type="xsd:double" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="claimAmount" type="xsd:double" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="resultText" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="freeTicketsNumber" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="refundAmount" type="xsd:double" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://nzlotteries.co.nz/exception/v1" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xsd:element name="faultInfo" type="e:FaultInfo"/> <xsd:complexType name="FaultInfo"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="exceptionClassName" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xsd:element name="exceptionMessage" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="validationInquiryInstantCmdInput"> <part name="input" element="v:validationInquiryInstantInput"/> </message> <message name="validationInquiryInstantCmdOutput"> <part name="output" element="v:validationInquiryInstantOutput"/> </message> <message name="validationInquiryOnlineCmdInput"> <part name="input" element="v:validationInquiryOnlineInput"/> </message> <message name="validationInquiryOnlineCmdOutput"> <part name="output" element="v:validationInquiryOnlineOutput"/> </message> <message name="fault"> <part name="faultInfo" element="e:faultInfo"/> </message> <portType name="PlayerPortType"> <operation name="validationInquiryInstantCmd"> <input name="validationInquiryInstantCmdInput" message="tns:validationInquiryInstantCmdInput"/> <output name="validationInquiryInstantCmdOutput" message="tns:validationInquiryInstantCmdOutput"/> <fault name="fault" message="tns:fault"/> </operation> <operation name="validationInquiryOnlineCmd"> <input name="validationInquiryOnlineCmdInput" message="tns:validationInquiryOnlineCmdInput"/> <output name="validationInquiryOnlineCmdOutput" message="tns:validationInquiryOnlineCmdOutput"/> <fault name="fault" message="tns:fault"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="PlayerSoapBinding" type="tns:PlayerPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="validationInquiryInstantCmd"> <soap:operation soapAction="validationInquiryInstantCmd" style="document"/> <input name="validationInquiryInstantCmdInput"> <soap:body parts="input" use="literal" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output name="validationInquiryInstantCmdOutput"> <soap:body parts="output" use="literal" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> <operation name="validationInquiryOnlineCmd"> <soap:operation soapAction="validationInquiryOnlineCmd" style="document"/> <input name="validationInquiryOnlineCmdInput"> <soap:body parts="input" use="literal" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </input> <output name="validationInquiryOnlineCmdOutput"> <soap:body parts="output" use="literal" encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"/> </output> <fault name="fault"> <soap:fault name="fault" use="literal"/> </fault> </operation> </binding> <service name="PlayerService"> <port name="PlayerSoapPort" binding="tns:PlayerSoapBinding"> <soap:address location="http://{host}:{port}/PlayerService/v1"/> </port> </service> </definitions>
